name: airweave
description: Search your apps, databases, and APIs from Claude. Airweave syncs and indexes data from 40+ sources (Slack, GitHub, Notion, Jira, Google Drive, Salesforce, databases, and more) into searchable collections. This plugin connects Claude to your Airweave collections via MCP, giving it hybrid/neural/keyword search with LLM reranking across all your connected data.
